name: DEVICESETTINGS Change connections table / save settings
DASHBOARD Autosending on page load
info:
ctrl messages from uibuilder node are analysed.

If page is (re)loading, the flow downwards is triggered.

See here:
https://github.com/TotallyInformation/node-red-contrib-uibuilder/wiki/How-to-send-data-when-a-client-connects-or-reloads-the-page

sql:
SELECT 
    name
FROM 
    sqlite_master 
WHERE 
    type ='table' AND 
    name LIKE '%100100205';

name: select table names with deviceId
template:
SELECT 
    name
FROM 
    sqlite_master 
WHERE 
    type ='table' AND 
    name LIKE '%{{deviceId}}';

template: update connections set lastmsgtime = {{timeunix}} where refid = {{curRefId}};

name: backup payload and extract refId
update connections entry

name: check if isvisible changed
read old isvisible value
template: select isvisible from connections where refid = {{deviceId}};
